# DatePicker

日期选择器。{ .lead }

### 示例 <small>Examples</small>

<div class="bs-example">
    <div class="content">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-6">
                <h4>日期 <code>bx-options</code></h4>
                <div bx-name="components/datepicker" bx-options="{ type: 'date' }"></div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-6">
                <h4>日期 <code>data-type</code></h4>
                <div bx-name="components/datepicker" data-type="date"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="bs-example">
    <div class="content">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-6">
                <h4>时间 <code>bx-options</code></h4>
                <div bx-name="components/datepicker" bx-options="{ type: 'time' }"></div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-6">
                <h4>时间 <code>data-type</code></h4>
                <div bx-name="components/datepicker" data-type="time"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="bs-example">
    <div class="content">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-6">
                <h4>日期 + 时间 <code>bx-options</code></h4>
                <div bx-name="components/datepicker" bx-options="{ type: 'all' }"></div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-6">
                <h4>日期 + 时间 <code>data-type</code></h4>
                <div bx-name="components/datepicker" data-type="all"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="bs-example">
    <div class="content">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-6">
                <h4>年份 <code>bx-options</code></h4>
                <div bx-name="components/datepicker" bx-options="{ type: 'year' }"></div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-6">
                <h4>年份 <code>data-type</code></h4>
                <div bx-name="components/datepicker" data-type="year"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="bs-example">
    <div class="content">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-6">
                <h4>月份 <code>bx-options</code></h4>
                <div bx-name="components/datepicker" bx-options="{ type: 'month' }"></div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-6">
                <h4>月份 <code>data-type</code></h4>
                <div bx-name="components/datepicker" data-type="month"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
